channel.title: Merch on Projektemacher Merch
channel.description: Recent content in Merch on Projektemacher Merch

item.title: Die Kleiderbügel-Sammlung Christian Mahnke
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The first book about one of my collections is now available: the catalogue of my clothes hanger collection!

item.title: Der flammende Baum
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
The motif on the book originally had no reference to Christmas, but here it is on the project maker Christmas hoodie 2025.

Frida Schanz (1859-1944), was a very active author of children’s and young adult books at the end of the 19th and beginning of the 20th century. The illustration is by Hugo Steiner-Prag, who also illustrated The Golem, for example.

item.title: Sherlock Holmes hat ausgedient
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The book “Shelock Homes hat ausgedient” by Klaus Polkehn, published by Kinderbuchverlag Berlin in 1961 is an interesting example of advertising for the profession of (people’s) policeman.

item.title: Wilma Bräuner
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
The shirt to the exhibition!

Wilma Bräuner’s signature, as on her calendars.

item.title: Ric - an unknown artist
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
The shirt to the blog!

Just Ric’s signature.

item.title: Der praktische Hynotiseuer
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: The book “Der praktische Hypnotiseur Anleitung zum Hypnotisieren sowie zur Erteilung von Suggestionen zu Heil- u. Erziehungszwecken” by Reinhold Gerling was a bestseller, as can be seen from the number of copies. No wonder with such a popular topic.

item.title: All seeing WiFi
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: A warning sign that combines the WiFi symbol and the all-seeing eye. In the unlikely event that the hotspots are tracking you….

item.title: Wir wollen nur eure Seele
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
This book by Ulrich Bäumer warns against the dangers of “occult” rock music. All in all it is an amusing evangelical work of art in parts.

Much of what you can read there seems familiar as an urban legend if you already lived in the 80s or early 90s. One of the few testimonies of the “Satanic Panic” that made it to Germany in book form.

item.title: Privacy policy
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description:
Hosting

The hoster collects the following data transmitted by your browser in log files:

  • IP address
  • The address of the previously visited website (Referer [sic!] request header)
  • Date and time of the enquiry
  • Time zone difference to Greenwich Mean Time
  • Content of the request
  • HTTP status code
  • Amount of data transferred
  • Website from which the request originates
  • Information about the browser and operating system

This is necessary to display the website and to ensure stability and security. This corresponds to a legitimate interest within the meaning of Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR.
